com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player

类 PlayerWithScores

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player.Player
      • com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player.PlayerWithScores
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class PlayerWithScores
extends Player
implements java.lang.Comparable
    This object is only used on the Scoreboard page, to contain scores, along with the inherited Player attributes, which are calculated on-the-fly when that page is invoked. Once the scores--including the greatest potential score--are tallied, the servlet can easily display them.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addWin

        public void addWin(int gameIndex,
                   int points)
        Add a given number of points to my scores. Calculate the appropriate round according to 'gameIndex', in order to add the points to that round.
        参数:
        gameIndex - the bracket-order index of the game
        points - the number of points I get for the win

      • getScore

        public int getScore(int round)
        Return my score, thus far, for the specified round.
        参数:
        round - the round for which a score is wanted
        返回:
        my actual score for that round

      • getTotalScore

        public int getTotalScore()
        Return my total score, thus far, adding up all five rounds.
        返回:
        my total score

      • addPotential

        public void addPotential(int points)
        Add 'points' to my current potential score.
        参数:
        points - a points value to be added to my potential

      • getPotentialScore

        public int getPotentialScore()
        Return my maximum potential points, based on the available game scores.
        返回:
        the best potential score for this player

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object otherPlayer)
        Compare this PlayerWithScores to another, for sorting by total score.
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable
        参数:
        otherPlayer - a player to compare to this one
        返回:
        a comparison value between this player and 'otherPlayer'
